class

PlaceableFit

  1. Home
  2. PlaceableFit

new PlaceableFit()

Description

Utility class for locating a free area on the grid from a given initial 'requested' position. Effectively slides the requested position to a nearby position free of other tokens (by default, but accepts arbitrary canvas layers with quad trees)

Details

lib/PlaceableFit.mjs, line 63
